ShouldersLVBBUprightRow.name: Lever Barbell Upright Row (plate loaded)
ShouldersLVBBUprightRow.preparation: Stand behind bar midthigh height, facing away from from fulcrum. Grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright.
ShouldersLVBBUprightRow.execution: Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.
ShouldersLVBBUprightRow.synergists: infraspinatus, brachioradialis, serratusanterior, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, supraspinatus, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, teresminor

ShouldersLVLateralRaiseH.name: Lever Lateral Raise (plate loaded)
ShouldersLVLateralRaiseH.preparation: Sit in machine. Situate bent arms between padded lever and sides of body.
ShouldersLVLateralRaiseH.execution: Raise arms to sides until upper arms are horizontal. Return and repeat.
